environment.title: Ichebe Ụwa Anyị
environment.subtitle: Nchekwa Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
environment.description: Imekọ ihe omume na-adigide na mbọ nchekwa iji chebe usoro okike maka ọgbọ ndị na-abịa, ebe anyị na-enye obodo ndị obodo ike.

healthcare.title: Nlekọta Ahụike Maka Mmadụ Niile
healthcare.subtitle: Ọdịmma Obodo
healthcare.description: Inye ọrụ ahụike dị mkpa na agụmakwụkwọ ahụike na obodo ndị na-enweghị ọrụ, na-ahụ na onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịnweta nlekọta ahụike dị mma.

stories.title: Akụkọ Mmetụta Anyị
stories.subtitle: Chọpụta ka anyị si emepụta mgbanwe na-adigide na obodo niile n'ụwa

cta.title: Ị Dị Njikere ỊKụ Mkpụrụ Nke Mgbanwe?
cta.subtitle: Soro ndị nnọchiteanya mgbanwe anyị na-eto eto wee nyere anyị aka ịzụlite olileanya na obodo ndị kacha chọọ ya. Ntinye aka ọ bụla, n'agbanyeghị nha ya, na-emepụta ebili mmiri nke mgbanwe dị mma.

hero.subtitle: Dị ka nnukwu osisi baobab, anyị kwenyere na mgbọrọgwụ miri emi, uto siri ike, na mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide.

mission.title: Ọrụ Anyị
mission.text: Ịzụlite uto na-adigide na obodo site na mmụta, inye ike, na njikwa gburugburu ebe obibi, na-emepụta mgbanwe dị mma na-adịgide adịgide nke na-agụnye ọgbọ.
mission.description: Kemgbe e guzobere anyị na 2020, anyị ewepụtala onwe anyị iji mepụta ngwọta na-adigide nke na-edozi mgbọrọgwụ nke ịda ogbenye, enweghị nhatanha, na mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi.

values.title: Ụkpụrụ Ndị bụ Isi Anyị
values.subtitle: Ụkpụrụ ndị bụ isi anyị na-eduzi mkpebi ọ bụla anyị na-eme na omume ọ bụla anyị na-eme na ọrụ nke ọrụ anyị.
values.growthDescription: Anyị kwenyere na ịzụlite ngwọta na-adigide ogologo oge nke na-esiwanye ike ka oge na-aga, dị ka osisi baobab.
values.communityDescription: Obodo dị n'etiti ihe niile anyị na-eme. Anyị na-ege ntị, na-amụ ihe, ma na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji mepụta mgbanwe nwere isi.
values.transparencyDescription: Anyị na-edobe nghọta zuru oke na arụmọrụ anyị, ego anyị, na mmetụta anyị iji wulite ntụkwasị obi na-adịgide adịgide na ndị na-akwado anyị.
values.empowermentDescription: Anyị na-enye ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na obodo ngwaọrụ, ihe ọmụma, na akụ na ụba ha chọrọ iji nwee ọganihu n'onwe ha.

timeline.title: Na-eto Eto Kemgbe 2020
timeline.subtitle: Site na mmalite anyị dị umeala n'obi ruo mmetụta zuru ụwa ọnụ, lee ka BAOBAB HOPE si eto ma gbanwee.

milestone1.description: Malitere na ọhụụ iji mepụta mgbanwe na-adigide

milestone2.description: Malitere mmemme ịgụ akwụkwọ na obodo 3

milestone3.description: Gbasaa iji tinye ọrụ nchekwa na nkwado

milestone4.description: Webatara ụlọọgwụ na-agagharị agagharị na agụmakwụkwọ ahụike

milestone5.description: Na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na mba 18 na kọntinent 4

impact.title: Mmetụta Anyị Na-eto Eto
impact.subtitle: Ọnụọgụ na-akọ akụkọ nke ndụ agbanwere na obodo enyere ike.

team.title: Ndị Nọ N'azụ Ọrụ
team.subtitle: Zute ndị mmadụ raara onwe ha nye na-edu nzukọ anyị ma na-akwali ọrụ anyị n'ihu.

member2.name: Jean-Baptiste Dubois
member2.bio: Ọkachamara mmụta na-elekwasị anya na mmemme mmụta nke obodo na-edu

member3.name: Sarah Chen
member3.bio: Onye nlekọta ahụike nwere mmasị na nlekọta ahụike enwere ike ịnweta

history.title: Akụkọ Ihe Mere Eme Anyị
history.subtitle: Njem BAOBAB HOPE site na echiche dị nta ruo mmegharị ụwa niile

founding.title: Mmalite nke Olileanya
founding.description: E guzobere BAOBAB HOPE na 2020 na ọhụụ dị mfe mana dị ike: imepụta mgbanwe na-adigide na obodo niile n'ụwa.

growth.title: Na-agbanye Mgbọrọgwụ
growth.description: Site na mmalite anyị dị umeala n'obi, anyị etoola iji jee ozi obodo na mba 18, na-anọgide na-eguzosi ike n'ihe na ụkpụrụ ndị bụ isi anyị.

impact.title: Na-emepụta Mmetụta
impact.description: Taa, anyị agbanweela ihe karịrị ndụ 75,000 site na mmemme mmụta, ahụike, na gburugburu ebe obibi anyị.

cta.title: Bụrụ Akụkụ nke Akụkọ Ihe Mere Eme Anyị
cta.subtitle: Soro puku kwuru puku ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo na ndị na-akwado na-enyere anyị aka ide akụkụ na-esote nke olileanya.

projects.title: Ọrụ Anyị
projects.subtitle: Chọpụta atụmatụ mgbanwe na-emepụta mgbanwe na-adigide na obodo niile n'ụwa.

education.title: Mmụta Na Ịgụ Akwụkwọ
education.description: Iwulite ntọala mmụta na-enye obodo ike ịga nke ọma na ito eto n'ụzọ na-adigide.

environment.title: Nchekwa Gburugburu Ebe Obibi
environment.description: Ichebe na iweghachi usoro okike ebe anyị na-akụziri obodo ndị obodo omume na-adigide.

healthcare.title: Ahụike Obodo
healthcare.description: Inye ọrụ ahụike dị mkpa na agụmakwụkwọ ahụike na obodo ndị na-enweghị ọrụ.

water.description: Iwulite usoro mmiri na-adigide na ịkụziri omume nchekwa mmiri.

why.item1: Ngọta 100% na otu esi eji ego
